This is the condition of the minds of those whom the Lord will make a light to the people among whom they may be established. But we shall not please God by building our sanitarium among the wealthy who worship those who can make a great show. Our modesty and humility would not bear the test. Thousands of dollars of the Lord's money would be absorbed in seeking to 


                                  -245- 

make a display. This does not make the human agent any happier. His course displeases God and brings reproach upon the sacred work which we are handling.
